test

Class TestStats

  • Object
    • TestStats

  • public class TestStats
extends Object
    A class recording statistics about unit tests, including: the number of tests executed, the number of test passed, the "passed" mark and the "total" mark.

    This class is thread-safe. Methods are synchronized on this.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestStats() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(String test, boolean isPassed)
      Adds to these statistics the specified test with the specified execution status and default weight of 1.0.
      void add(String test, boolean isPassed, double weight)
      Adds to theses statistics the specified test with the specified execution status and the specified weight.
      void add(TestStats other)
      Adds to these statistics the specified statistics.
      String toString()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(String test,
                boolean isPassed)
        Adds to these statistics the specified test with the specified execution status and default weight of 1.0.
        Parameters:
        test - the description of the test
        isPassed - the execution status of the test

      • add

        public void add(String test,
                boolean isPassed,
                double weight)
        Adds to theses statistics the specified test with the specified execution status and the specified weight. In addition, the method print a success / failed message on standard output.
        Parameters:
        test - the description of the test
        isPassed - the execution status of the test
        weight - the weight of the test

      • add

        public void add(TestStats other)
        Adds to these statistics the specified statistics.
        Parameters:
        other - the statistics to add

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
